school: Johns Hopkins University Whiting School of Engineering
program: Master of Science in Data Science

sections.text: The MS in Data Science develops expertise in statistical methods, machine learning, and computational tools to address dataâ€‘intensive challenges across industries.
Students complete core courses in statistics, computer science, and applied data science, with electives enabling specialization in domains such as health care, engineering, and business analytics.
Applicants should have strong quantitative preparation; the degree requires approved coursework and may include applied projects.
Graduates pursue careers in data science, machine learning engineering, analytics, and research roles.
